features: Heavy gauge aluminum construction ensures even heating and is hard anodized for durability; It also makes it dishwasher safe
Frying pan interior includes 3 layers of nonstick 2 layers provide durability and the third layer offers easy release performance
The long, brushed stainless steel handles are designed to stay cool on the stove top; Pans and covers are also oven safe, making it ideal for finishing a gourmet dish
Flat, wide bottoms heat evenly and provide plenty of room for cooking; The sloped sides are designed for easy tossing and rolling
The nonstick surface means you can cook healthier using less fat, with effortless cleanup; Comes with Calphalon's full lifetime warranty
body.description: Dishwasher safe for easy cleanup, The Calphalon contemporary nonstick 10-in. Fry pan is created with multi-layer non stick for ultra durability. The stunning, contemporary design looks beautiful in the kitchen, and heavy-gauge, hard-anodized aluminum ensures even heating. With thick, flat bottoms and gently sloping sides, The frying pan is perfect for preparing eggs and omelets, sautéed vegetables, potatoes, crab cakes, patty melts and more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: At a Glance: Stylish and durable nonstick fry pan Thick, flat bottom with sloping sides Hard-anodized aluminum for even heating Dishwasher safe Oven safe to 450 degrees Fahrenheit Calphalon Contemporary Nonstick 10-inch Fry Pan The Calphalon Contemporary Nonstick 10-inch Fry Pan features a stylish, modern design that looks great in the kitchen while offering reliable everyday performance. This fry pan has a thick, flat bottom with gently sloping sides, making it ideal for preparing eggs and omelettes, sautéing vegetables, and frying crab cakes. Heavy-gauge, hard-anodized aluminum construction ensures even heating, while a multi-layer nonstick surface offers exceptional durability and easy cleanup. And unlike most hard-anodized cookware, this fry pan is dishwasher-safe. The Calphalon Contemporary Nonstick 10-inch Fry Pan is oven safe to 450 degrees Fahrenheit and backed by a full lifetime warranty.

Versatile Fry Pan for Everyday Cooking This nonstick 10-inch pan features a thick, flat bottom and gently sloping sides making it ideal for flipping or turning foods. Use the Calphalon Contemporary Nonstick 10-inch Fry Pan to prepare delicious frittatas, scrambles, and more. Hard-Anodized Aluminum This heavy-gauge fry pan is made of hard-anodized aluminum that offers consistent heat distribution, making it ideal for searing, sautéing, and more. A long, double-riveted stainless steel handle makes handling easy and stays cool while you’re cooking on the stovetop. Multi-Layer Nonstick Surface Thanks to a durable triple-layer, PFOA-free nonstick surface, the Calphalon Contemporary Nonstick 10-inch Fry Pan lets you cook confidently without worrying that food will stick to the pan. The nonstick surface also allows you to use less oil or butter for healthy, low-fat cooking.

Dishwasher and Oven Safe The Calphalon Contemporary Nonstick 10-inch Fry Pan is dishwasher safe for quick and easy cleaning. You can use this fry pan safely in the oven at temperatures up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit. This fry pan is intended for gas, electric, electric ring, halogen, or glass ceramic stove tops, and should be used with nylon, coated, or wooden utensils to protect the nonstick surface from damage.
Contemporary Design. Ultra-Durable Nonstick. With its sleek, curving style, this nonstick omelette pan lends an elegant aesthetic to your kitchen.

How to Cook with Nonstick - Never use cooking spray. Aerosol cooking spray leaves a gummy residue that is difficult to remove, and that residue will cause food to stick. Instead, use an oil mister filled with olive or vegetable oil, or dab a bit of oil on a paper towel and carefully wipe the interior of the pan. - Use the correct heat setting. Use low heat for warming, simmering and preparing sauces; use medium heat for frying, grilling, sautéing, searing or stir-frying; use high heat for boiling or reducing liquids. - Preheat the pan. Nonstick cookware can take a minute or two longer to preheat compared to aluminum or stainless steel cookware. For best results, make sure your nonstick pan is heated to the proper temperature before adding food. Full Lifetime Warranty This product is backed by a full lifetime warranty. Calphalon will replace any item found defective in material or workmanship when put to normal household use and cared for according to the instructions. To register your products, visit our official site.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is a Keeper
reviews.reviewText: Arrived six weeks ago. Yes, there are a large number of models and manufactures of frying pans. The question is how often do you use it, for what kinds of food , what kind of utensils are you using and finally what do you really expect from a frying pan? Honest answers before hand will likely keep you from being disappointed. This one cooks well for a variety of foods on my flat top electic stove. It cleans up nicely with a non-scratch pad inside and outside. Only one small concern: all previous pans of tis size fit flatly in my stainless sink. This one has a handle 1.5 inch longer. Oh well, I will just have to enjoy its other great atttributes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best pans we have ever owned.
reviews.reviewText: We have had this pan for a while now and we use it nearly everyday and it looks and performs just as good as the first day we owned it.We plan on purchasing either this exact same pan again or the same pan in a different size soon.The construction of the pan is solid while the pan maintains a light weight that is easy to work with.Cleaning the pan has never been an issue even if the pan was cleaned immediately.We also have not ever had any issues with items sticking/burning to the pan including cheeses and sauces. It always performs and cleans up amazing if and has great heat distribution.We use our pan on a gas range so I cannot say how it would respond on an electric range.Definitely worth the buy and Amazon often has a Multi size two pack of this pan for a great deal as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, quality, quality! Absolutely the best...
reviews.reviewText: Forget the gimmicks-copper color, granite, green, etc. I’ve used and gotten rid of most of them. They worked great for the first few to several months. Then, the non-stick feature fades away. I’ve ended up having to soak them after each use, scrape them with a plastic spatula, and, then, scrub them with a nylon pad. This is a high quality pan (use it only for eggs). I have two other Calphalon pans that get daily use for everything else. Nothing sticks, nothing at all. Heat distribution is so great that I never have to use above a medium low temperature. Clean up is a breeze. They look new after years of daily use. I will never fall for a gimmick, again. You get what you pay for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great brand and one of the best non-stick
reviews.reviewText: I have this brand of stainless steel pots and pans but wasn't happy with my current non-stick pans. I bought this one and I am extremely happy with their non-stick pan also. Performs better than any previous non-stick pan I've owned before this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2006
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Why I love this pan and Calphalon...
reviews.reviewText: When I first got this pan I thought it was a little heavy, but after using it...love it. I have been able to saute onions and potatoes to a flavorful brown, scramble eggs to perfection, cook pork chops and the pan still cleans up so easy. I also like the responsiveness to heat...it takes temp changes well..heating up and cooling off pretty fast. The shape is good with that nice little flair and deep enough to do a lot more than omelets. A plus is that my Calphalon lids fit - both the glass 10" and the stainless lid. At this price this pan is a bargain. And of course I love that free shipping and good customer service of Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Good Product while it last, horrible customer service after
reviews.reviewText: Buying from Amazon? you need to make sure it ships and is SOLD by amazon, otherwise Calphalon will use it as an excuse to not warrant the item.The make you run into hoops to try to warranty an item only to find whatever loophole possible in order to not honor their warranty.Great pan for a while (1 year) but trash after.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great quality for a medium-priced pan. comfortable handle. Sides are perfectly shaped for "flipping". Heats fast and evenly on our electric range. I've had various Calphalon pans for years and they've held up great with reasonable care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for an occasional user
reviews.reviewText: It is very easy to clean and so far shows no impact from the stainless steel spatula that I use. Handle cleans up well also and looks good.

I'm new to Calphalon having used 'premium' frying pans in the past. Very impressed with the pan! I've been using for about three weeks, two to three times a week. The non-stick is a joy and super easy to clean (as expected). The best parts for me are: 1. the value - a substantially better value than what I've used before; and 2. the ability to "flip" food - the edge design and handle make it supper easy! Will buy another when this one wears out.

We received a damaged product, and in order to receive a refund we have to go through the hassle of finding a printer and taking to UPS store. Which defeats the point of buying something online in the first place. We hope we can simply be refunded, or sent a new undamaged one.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bit fussy with care and use instructions. Hope it lasts.
reviews.reviewText: Bit on the small side. I am being very careful with it. No dishwasher, no high heat which is annoying but it is what it is. I plan on only using it for eggs and so only needs low to medium heat.If anything goes wrong I will update

It is impossible to describe how much difference a good frying pan makes. This one is thick enough to retain heat well (as cast iron pans usually tend to do) and triple Teflon layer makes it versatile when it comes to cooking anything from eggs and bacon, to steak and salmon.As it is Teflon, you are bound to invest a bit into Nylon kitchen utensils to avoid scratching and peeling of this beauty!
